original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3491)@</color>連續揮舞手中的武器，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3491)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3491)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>造成四次傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3491)@</color> Continuously wave the weapon in your hand to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3491)@ </color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3491)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> cause four damages.
